title: Venting here before i explode in game
body: I just had the most tilting game over the last 30 days, I almost lost my shit. I went fid jungle and my top WW decided he wanted to steal my blue instead of help me get it... Then when blue spawns again the ENEMY ww was in the bush so i lured it up and pinged danger and assist me, he comes and steals it AGAIN then ints it to the enemy WW by chasing him all the way to tier 2 top tower from our blue buff. repeats this 3 or 4 more times all the while my mid (Yasuo.... shocker that hes a fkin twat right?) tries to tell me im in the wrong for telling him to stop stealing my fkin blue buff as JUNGLE FIDDLE when my W eats my whole fuckin mana bar to kill multiple mob camps. he persists to troll me the entire game and int my jungle buffs to the enemy warwick and the yasuo defends him for this, we ultimatly lose because of it... like... i HONESTLY dont understand the stupid ass fkin people on this game, the ones who do this, and the ones who defend it.... Can someone explain to me WHY anyone would defend this type of trolling? they werent duo que'd from what i could tell. the yasuo player was simply stupid. I cant even express how bad i wanted to explode on both of them but I didnt. playing this late at night seems to draw out even more of the shit stains that smudge up this community than normal.

replies.body: And this is why you don't play Blind Pick boys and girls.
This is why we have a Mute option, also take a break from league... if you actually have to vent on the boards you just need to stop playing for like a couple days or so.

Venting on the boards is actually one of the correct usages of the word 'vent', and one of the correct places to vent.

Consider an overheating boiler. You vent the excess pressure to avoid an explosion [damage to yourself] and it's vented to a place where it causes no damage to others. Flaming in chat would be like venting the boiling steam onto the train's passengers, not the best solution.

Or consider working under a fume hood with toxic chemicals. It is vented away from you, through a filter/processor to be harmlessly released. No damage to you, no damage to your coworkers, and hopefully no damage to the environment.

He's venting on the boards, through a filter. Note the lack of vile imprecations. No damage to him. No damage to his team. And hopefully, no damage to the readers (environment). It looks good to me.

Ah yea, you also don't seem to understand and take everything at face value.

I'll just be straight out with it since y'all seem to have trouble understanding.

Since he's venting on these boards, which if you look at all... is filled with constant toxic behavior, so him venting here must mean it was pretty bad and that he should take a break from league and come back when he feels better.

But hey, do you if comprehension is a struggle, it's a struggle... gl with it all.

I'll just say this.... You seem to be going on a lot trying to look superior and all knowing throwing around lack of comprehension when from my eyes, and others it seems you are the one lacking comprehension. I would say feel free to comment something constructive, maybe share a story or whatever when you gain the comprehension you need to see what this post is about.... Buuuuut we all know thats not going to happen, next flame incoming.

na, im just that i feel for you, but for whatever reason you seem to thinking responding by attacking me is the best solution. 


It's not my fault you cant see an underlining statement fam. Poor you
The passive aggressive anger you so clearly glow with shows exactly what you're trying to do. Sadly for you... no one cares. post reported. You can stop anytime now.

This has been noted, thank you. For future benefit I recommend not replying to people you feel are commenting only to bother you; it only invites another response that is unlikely to be any better and often keeps going until it escalates and people need to be warned or punished.
As you've been asked to stop by the OP it's better that you move on. You don't need to get the last word in, just leave them alone so this doesn't escalate.

yes, attacking someone is a way to ask them to stop, your logic is just as flawed.

It's only one side with you isn't it?

I also spoke to him, so no it absolutely isn't "only one side with me". If you choose to continue that's on you. He asked you to stop, even if he didn't do it in a way you like.

If you have questions or concerns about this please visit us in the [PB&M channel of the Moderation Discord here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/ZfE311GQ-discord-verification), as this will no longer be discussed here to avoid further derailing the topic.
You cant MUTE someone stealing ur jg buffs and inting them to the enemy jungler. And no, If i want to vent, i can vent and still play.

i mean i was showing sympathy for your troubles, but uh... go ahead and just keep crying on the boards, you do you guy.

Your attitude makes it somewhat clear why you got trolled.
Man dude I know how you feel... Ive had an adc come to my red and steal then go back bot... :/ its always my ranked games.. I seriously cant play ranked games without troll.
Yea this is the sole reason I smite blue buff when I am with people I don't know or trust, if they stay past smite range, I smite.
It's alright man let it all out here, I do it too sometimes.

The secret way to get good with smite... playing with troll team mates.
